Description: Lip and wall sherd of East Greek pottery cup of hemispherical shape; pale red-brown clay with white inclusions and no mica; interior glazed streaky red; exterior: cream slip, with line at top of rim and two orange bands on lower wall; inscription cut on exterior, in reserved zone.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), temenos (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.361)
